//total add cart items
export var getCartTotal=function getCartTotal(cartItems){var total=0;var items=0;for(var i=0;i<cartItems.length;i++){items=cartItems[i].qty*cartItems[i].price;total=total+items;}return total;};// Get Unique Brands from Json Data
export var getBrands=function getBrands(products){var uniqueBrands=[];// eslint-disable-next-line
products.map(function(product,index){if(product.tags){// eslint-disable-next-line
product.tags.map(function(tag){if(uniqueBrands.indexOf(tag)===-1){uniqueBrands.push(tag);}});}});return uniqueBrands;};// Get Unique Colors from Json Data
export var getColors=function getColors(products){var uniqueColors=[];// eslint-disable-next-line
products.map(function(product,index){if(product.colors){// eslint-disable-next-line
product.colors.map(function(color){if(uniqueColors.indexOf(color)===-1){uniqueColors.push(color);}});}});return uniqueColors;};// Get Minimum and Maximum Prices from Json Data
export var getMinMaxPrice=function getMinMaxPrice(products){var min=100,max=1000;// eslint-disable-next-line
products.map(function(product,index){var v=product.price;min=v<min?v:min;max=v>max?v:max;});return{'min':min,'max':max};};export var getVisibleproducts=function getVisibleproducts(data,_ref){var brand=_ref.brand,color=_ref.color,value=_ref.value,sortBy=_ref.sortBy,searchBy=_ref.searchBy;return data.filter(function(product){var brandMatch;if(product.tags)brandMatch=product.tags.some(function(tag){return brand.includes(tag);});else brandMatch=true;var colorMatch;if(color&&product.colors){colorMatch=product.colors.includes(color);}else{colorMatch=true;}var startPriceMatch=typeof value.min!=='number'||value.min<=product.price;var endPriceMatch=typeof value.max!=='number'||product.price<=value.max;var searchByName=product.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchBy)>-1;return brandMatch&&colorMatch&&startPriceMatch&&endPriceMatch&&searchByName;}).sort(function(product1,product2){if(sortBy==='HighToLow'){return product2.price<product1.price?-1:1;}else if(sortBy==='LowToHigh'){return product2.price>product1.price?-1:1;}else if(sortBy==='Newest'){return product2.id<product1.id?-1:1;}else if(sortBy==='AscOrder'){return product1.name.localeCompare(product2.name);}else if(sortBy==='DescOrder'){return product2.name.localeCompare(product1.name);}else{return product2.id>product1.id?-1:1;}});};
